name: What happens after Death? (Under Development)
description: This is a game made for the Bean Jam. Made within 3 hours only. This game is still under development and may have some bugs. this is a multiplayer game. controls for player 1 => WASD (GREEN). Controls for player 2 are => UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT. Due to overpopulation  in afterlife, you get to battle other candidates for coming back to life
